updates.details: Router upgrades will result in a ~10 minute network interruption between 2025-04-30 07:00 and 2025-04-30 09:00
The RAL network should be considered at risk until 1600 on Wednesday 30th April
Advance notice of regular scheduled maintenance day on Tues 29 April 2025. Please plan your work to minimise disruption.
Most maintenance work completed but some updates to LOTUS2 nodes to be completed tomorrow: this will impact job processing until more nodes can be made available. Further update to follow tomorrow.

summary: I/O errors writing to PFS from within Slurm jobs

updates.details: Issue reported where I/O errors occur when writing to PFS storage volumes from Slurm jobs. Appears to be memory-related: initial advice is to increase memory allocation for job. Investigation underway with vendor, awaiting further advice.
LOTUS1 ORCHID, including interactive GPU node gpuhost001, was planned to be fully migrated to Rocky 9 by Tuesday 29th April, but due to unforeseen circumstances this has been pushed to today.
LOTUS1 ORCHID & interactive GPU node migration is still in progress, but GPU notebooks are available.

affectedServices: Tape services: Elastic Tape (ET), JDMA, NLA
